record.description: Sean Ronan, Irish Consul General in Chicago thanks Margaret Stinson, Miss University of Chicago for complimentary tickets to a St. Patrick's Day performance of The Playboy of the Western World by the Irish Players. The six-day appearance at Mandel Hall on the Midway campus begins March 17th and is sponsored by the University of Chicago Alumni Association. Co-eds shown are daughters of alumni. Left to right: Barbara Flynn, Chicago; Norma Schmidt, Rockford, Illinois; Ronan and Miss Stinson, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
